text: Lazarus MunamuaLetter from Lazarus Munamua to Raymond Firth, 16 September 1972 was the second Bishop of Temotu (1987-1998),Solomons Islands Constitutional Reform Unit one of the nine dioceses that make up the Anglican Church of Melanesia.ACOM ==References== Category:Anglican bishops in Oceania Category:20th-century Anglican bishops Category:Bishops of Temotu
title: Lazarus Munamua
